VersionInfo.Title: Markdown Monster 3.7.2 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
This release adds a number of enhancements:
* Updated to .NET 9.0 for better performance * Native ARM64 Supp * AI Support: Summarize, Translate, Grammar Checking * Split the Left Sidebar for multi-panel display * New Link Checker Sidebar * Support for Admonitions Extensions * Capture YouTube Preview Images for YT Embeddings * plus [much more...](https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/main/Changelog.md)
